creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: loose, disjointed lines of loopy cursive
inscription:
Signature and Inscription:

(For my love I want a jewel. / Foaming waves, / bring me the pearls / of the open sea!]
signed: Upper right reverse of paper, signed: (Ike-no Arina (pseudonym of Taiga))
title: Poem in Traditional Style
